document.full_text: bullion powered to a lifetime high for a fifth consecutive session on thursday on a sharply weaker dollar, while lingering tensions in the arab world, worries about the euro zone crisis and u.s. fiscal health offered additional support.
document.title: gold roars to all-time high for fifth straight session
lines_and_colors: bullion powered to a lifetime high for a fifth consecutive session on thursday on a sharply weaker dollar, while lingering tensions in the arab world, worries about the euro zone crisis and u.s. fiscal health offered additional support.
